comments.content:
Yep, you need a newer python-sphinx. Grab it from ppa:nova-core/build-depends.

-- 
Soren Hansen
Ubuntu Developer    http://www.ubuntu.com/
OpenStack Developer http://www.openstack.org/
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~soren

comments.content: Setting this to fixed, the site is working now.
